snippet: Jason Bay, a three-time All Star who has struggled since joining the Mets in 2010, batted eighth and contributed little in his return from a broken rib and illness.
abstract: New York Mets outfielder Jason Bay, a three-time All Star who has struggled since joining the team in 2010, bats eighth and contributes little against the New York Yankees, in his return from a broken rib and illness.
lead_paragraph: Jason Bay, a three-time All Star who has struggled since joining the Mets in 2010, batted eighth and contributed little in his return from a broken rib and illness.

headline.seo: Jason Bay Bats 8th in Return to Mets Lineup
headline.main: In Return to the Mets’ Lineup, Bay Picks Up Where He Left Off
headline.print_headline: In Return to the Mets’ Lineup, Bay Picks Up Where He Left Off
